ItemList.specifications: The iPhone 15 features a sleek design with dimensions of 147.6 x 71.6 x 7.8 mm and a weight of 171 grams, made from an aluminum frame with a Ceramic Shield front and glass back, available in colors like Pink, Yellow, Green, Blue, and Black. It has a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with a resolution of 2556 x 1179 pixels and peak brightness up to 2000 nits. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip with 6 GB of RAM, it delivers impressive performance. The dual rear cameras include a 48 MP wide lens and a 12 MP ultra-wide lens, while the front 12 MP TrueDepth camera supports 4K video recording. With a battery life of up to 20 hours of talk time, it offers 20W wired and MagSafe wireless charging. Storage options range from 128 GB to 1 TB. Running iOS 17, it supports 5G, Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.3, and features a USB-C port, along with Face ID and IP68 water and dust resistance.

The iPhone 14 features a sleek design with dimensions of 146.7 x 71.5 x 7.8 mm and a weight of 172 grams. It has an aluminum frame, Ceramic Shield front, and glass back, available in colors such as Midnight, Starlight, Blue, Purple, and Product(RED). The device features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with a resolution of 2556 x 1179 pixels and peak brightness of up to 2000 nits. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip and equipped with 6 GB of RAM, the iPhone 14 delivers solid performance. The dual-camera system includes a 12 MP wide lens and a 12 MP ultra-wide lens, with a 12 MP TrueDepth front camera supporting 4K video recording. It offers battery life of up to 20 hours of talk time, with 20W wired and MagSafe wireless charging capabilities. Storage options range from 128 GB to 512 GB. Running on iOS 16, the iPhone 14 supports 5G connectivity, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.3, and features a Lightning port, along with Face ID and IP68 water and dust resistance.
